title: Vision-Language Model Fine-Tuning via Simple Parameter-Efficient Modification
details: M Li, J Zhong, C Li, L Li, N Lin, M Sugiyama - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.16718, 2024
abstract: Recent advances in fine-tuning Vision-Language Models (VLMs) have witnessed the success of prompt tuning and adapter tuning, while the classic model fine-tuning on inherent parameters seems to be overlooked. It is believed that fine-tuning the …
